name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Go**, **Linux**, and **Postgres**, with hands-on expertise in automation and virtualization technologies, including **QEMU** and **VMs**. Skilled in utilizing both frontend and backend frameworks such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django** to create robust applications. 
Experienced in developing solutions that integrate with compliance-driven standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in AI/ML platforms leveraging technologies for predictive analytics and automation, alongside deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Adept at implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, and well-versed in MLOps practices using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
